array.string:
launchctl setenv HOMEBREW_PREFIX /opt/homebrew launchctl setenv HOMEBREW_CELLAR /opt/homebrew/Cellar launchctl setenv HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY /opt/homebrew launchctl setenv HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_FILE /Users/dan/.config/homebrew/Brewfile launchctl setenv MANPATH /opt/homebrew/share/man launchctl setenv INFOPATH /opt/homebrew/share/info
launchctl setenv EMAIL 00.pavers_dither@icloud.com
launchctl setenv WEZTERM_DEFAULT_PROG /opt/homebrew/bin/nu launchctl setenv WEZTERM_FONT "Maple Mono" launchctl setenv WEZTERM_FONT_SIZE 16
launchctl setenv EDITOR hx launchctl setenv PAGER bat
launchctl setenv BAT_THEME base16-256
launchctl setenv XDG_DATA_HOME /Users/dan/.local/share launchctl setenv XDG_CONFIG_HOME /Users/dan/.config launchctl setenv XDG_STATE_HOME /Users/dan/.local/state launchctl setenv XDG_CACHE_HOME /Users/dan/.cache
launchctl setenv RUSTUP_HOME /Users/dan/.local/share/rustup launchctl setenv CARGO_HOME /Users/dan/.local/share/cargo
launchctl setenv GNUPGHOME /Users/dan/.local/share/gnupg
launchctl setenv PASSWORD_STORE_DIR /Users/dan/.local/share/pass
launchctl setenv PSQL_HISTORY /Users/dan/.local/share/psql_history
